verses.text: \w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w riches|strong="H6239"\w* \w and|strong="H6239"\w* \w honor|strong="H3519"\w* \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w*, \w and|strong="H6239"\w* he \w allied|strong="H2859"\w* himself \w with|strong="H2859"\w* Ahab \w by|strong="H1961"\w* \w marriage|strong="H2859"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5971"\w* \w some|strong="H7093"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w later|strong="H7093"\w* \w he|strong="H8141"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* visit Ahab \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, where Ahab \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* \w many|strong="H7230"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w cattle|strong="H1241"\w* \w for|strong="H5971"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* urged \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* march \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w Ramoth-gilead|strong="H7433"\w*.

Ahab \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* asked \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, “\w Will|strong="H4428"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H5973"\w* \w against|strong="H5973"\w* \w Ramoth-gilead|strong="H7433"\w*?” \w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* replied, “\w I|strong="H3478"\w* am \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w my|strong="H3478"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w your|strong="H3478"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w join|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w inquire|strong="H1875"\w* \w first|strong="H3117"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w assembled|strong="H6908"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, four \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* asked \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, “\w Should|strong="H3478"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* \w against|strong="H5927"\w* \w Ramoth-gilead|strong="H7433"\w*, \w or|strong="H3027"\w* \w should|strong="H3478"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w refrain|strong="H2308"\w*?” “\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*,” \w they|strong="H3478"\w* replied, “\w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w asked|strong="H1875"\w*, “\w Is|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H1875"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* whom \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w can|strong="H5750"\w* \w inquire|strong="H1875"\w*?”

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* answered, “\w There|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w can|strong="H7451"\w* \w ask|strong="H1875"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* never \w prophesies|strong="H5012"\w* \w anything|strong="H3605"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H8130"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w only|strong="H3588"\w* \w bad|strong="H7451"\w*. \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w Micaiah|strong="H4321"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Imlah|strong="H3229"\w*.” “\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w say|strong="H3478"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w*!” \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* replied.

\w So|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* \w officials|strong="H5631"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w*, “\w Bring|strong="H4116"\w* \w Micaiah|strong="H4318"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Imlah|strong="H3229"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* once.”

\w Dressed|strong="H3847"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w royal|strong="H4428"\w* attire, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w thrones|strong="H3678"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w threshing|strong="H1637"\w* \w floor|strong="H1637"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w entrance|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, \w with|strong="H3847"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w prophesying|strong="H5012"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3541"\w* \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Chenaanah|strong="H3668"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w himself|strong="H6213"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* declared, “\w This|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w With|strong="H3068"\w* \w these|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w gore|strong="H5055"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* Arameans \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w finished|strong="H3615"\w* \w off|strong="H3615"\w*.’”

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w were|strong="H3027"\w* \w prophesying|strong="H5012"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w same|strong="H3651"\w*, saying, “\w Go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Ramoth-gilead|strong="H7433"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w*, \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.” Micaiah Prophesies against Ahab (1 Kings 22:13–28)

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* \w who|strong="H5030"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w gone|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w Micaiah|strong="H4321"\w* \w instructed|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w*, “\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w one|strong="H2896"\w* \w accord|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w favorable|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*. \w So|strong="H1980"\w* \w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w theirs|strong="H1992"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w favorably|strong="H2896"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w Micaiah|strong="H4321"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w As|strong="H3068"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w lives|strong="H2416"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* whatever \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w tells|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H1696"\w*.”

\w When|strong="H5927"\w* \w Micaiah|strong="H4318"\w* arrived, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* asked \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, “\w Micaiah|strong="H4318"\w*, \w should|strong="H4428"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* \w against|strong="H5927"\w* \w Ramoth-gilead|strong="H7433"\w*, \w or|strong="H3027"\w* \w should|strong="H4428"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w refrain|strong="H2308"\w*?” “\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* triumph,” \w Micaiah|strong="H4318"\w* replied, “\w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H3027"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5927"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H7535"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H4428"\w*, “\w How|strong="H4100"\w* \w many|strong="H4100"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w make|strong="H8034"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H1696"\w* \w anything|strong="H4100"\w* \w but|strong="H7535"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w truth|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*?”

\w So|strong="H3808"\w* Micaiah declared: “\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hills|strong="H2022"\w* \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w*. \w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said, ‘\w These|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* master; \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w each|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.’”

\w Then|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* said \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w*, “\w Did|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* tell \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w prophesies|strong="H5012"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w only|strong="H3588"\w* \w bad|strong="H7451"\w*?”

Micaiah \w continued|strong="H3427"\w*, “\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*: \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w host|strong="H6635"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w left|strong="H8040"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said, ‘\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w entice|strong="H6601"\w* Ahab \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* march \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w Ramoth-gilead|strong="H7433"\w*?’ \w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* suggested \w this|strong="H2088"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w another|strong="H2088"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w forward|strong="H6440"\w*, \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w*, ‘\w I|strong="H4100"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w entice|strong="H6601"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*.’ ‘\w By|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* means?’ \w asked|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6213"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* replied, ‘\w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w lying|strong="H8267"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mouths|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*.’ ‘\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w surely|strong="H3318"\w* \w entice|strong="H6601"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w prevail|strong="H3201"\w*,’ \w said|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. ‘\w Go|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w*.’

\w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w see|strong="H2009"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w lying|strong="H8267"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w mouths|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w these|strong="H1696"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w yours|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w pronounced|strong="H1696"\w* \w disaster|strong="H7451"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Chenaanah|strong="H3668"\w* \w went|strong="H5674"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w*, \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w Micaiah|strong="H4321"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* face, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* demanded, “\w Which|strong="H3068"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H5674"\w* \w when|strong="H1696"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* departed \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*?”

\w Micaiah|strong="H4321"\w* replied, “\w You|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H1931"\w* soon \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* go \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w hide|strong="H2244"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w an|strong="H7200"\w* \w inner|strong="H2315"\w* \w room|strong="H2315"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* declared, “\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w Micaiah|strong="H4321"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* Amon \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w governor|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,
